executive_summary: The Online Car Rental industry comprises businesses that enable consumers to rent cars via online platforms such as websites or mobile apps...

current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The Online Car Rental industry has been growing over the five years to 2022...

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: While operators have been able to pass these costs down
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: While operators have been able to pass these costs down to consumers, the sudden price hike has hindered industry profitability...

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: IBISWorld expects that the industry will continue to grow
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: IBISWorld expects that the industry will continue to grow over the five years to 2027...

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Demand for the Online Car Rental industry is expected
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Demand for the Online Car Rental industry is expected to continue growing moving forward...
The increasing popularity of ride-sharing services, such as Uber and Lyft...
IBISWorld anticipates further industry consolidation as major operators continue expanding...

industry_definition: This industry includes operators that make rental car reservations and bookings online.
key_trends: Industry operators have continued to increase research and development expenditures
Rapidly rising commodity prices have slightly hindered industry profit growth
Industry employment is expected to increase due to a growing number of establishments
The industry is projected to benefit from an increasing number of mobile internet connections
The increasing popularity of ride-sharing services presents alternatives to car rental services
New entrants will likely expand the labor force to contend with rising competition
Most industry revenue gains can be attributed to rising commodity prices

market_segmentation.segment_description: In the Online Car Rental industry, most revenue is generated through airport services...
While most industry revenue is generated through airport customers, off-airport markets represent an important and growing source of revenue.

While most industry revenue is generated through airport customers, off-airport markets represent an important and growing source of revenue.

products_and_services.product_description: Compact cars are small in size and are typically good for two to four people...
Sedan cars are larger than compact cars...
Luxury vehicles come in different sizes...

tier_1_suppliers: Car & Automobile Manufacturing in the US
tier_2_suppliers: Internet Service Providers in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_description: Leisure and business air travelers are the primary markets for car rental services...
Disposable income measures the income consumers have available to spend after taxes...
The major determinant of demand for online business car rental services is corporate profitability...
Since industry services rely on internet access...
Business is being done and more face-to-face contact is being made between business partners.

business_locations.location_description: The Southeast region holds the most establishments, home to an estimated 28.1% of business locations in 2022...
Similarly, the West region holds 19.5% of industry establishments...
The Mid-Atlantic region also holds a substantial amount of industry establishments...

regulations_points.regulation_description: Operators are subject to increasing regulation relating to customer privacy and data protection...
The Federal Trade Commission (FTC), along with various state laws, regulate the sale of franchises...
Amid the COVID-19 (coronavirus) pandemic, many state governments imposed the closure of nonessential businesses...

barriers_points.barrier_description: Significant capital outlay for rental fleet investment and maintenance facilities.
Major operators have established sales relationships, marketing, and brand recognition...

basis_points.basis_description: Operators compete on price, range of offerings, rewards, strategic alliances with airlines/hotels...

basis_points.basis_title: Quality and Ease of Search Platform
basis_points.basis_description: Companies compete on quality and ease of use of search platform to facilitate purchases and add-ons.

concentration_points.concentration_description: Top 4 companies expected to generate over 40% revenue in 2022...

cost_factors.cost_factor_description: While less significant than purchases or depreciation costs, wages nonetheless represent a notable cost to industry operators...
Purchases account for an estimated share of industry revenue in 2022.
Depreciation typically represents the largest cost for industry operators.
Marketing costs represent a significant portion of industry revenues due to branding.
Rental costs account for a proportion of industry revenue as businesses often rent out operations premises.
Other miscellaneous costs are expected to account for a share of industry revenue in 2022.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: The Online Car Rental industry is highly capital intensive...
The average industry operator allocates more than 25.0% of revenue toward depreciation on owned assets...

volatility_points.volatility_description: The industry's primary market segments include individuals seeking vehicle rentals for leisure...
Industry operators benefited from rising disposable income and corporate profit levels...

technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Many industry operators have increased their investment in online services...
Industry operators are focusing on developing their smartphone apps...
